CASE T_log.Action WHEN 'file_upload' THEN 'Upload' WHEN 'file_download' THEN 'Download' ELSE
T_log.Action END AS UpDown
FROM T_log
ORDER BY YEAR(T_log.LogTime),MONTH(T_log.LogTime), DAY(T_log.LogTime)'
" ss64database
